alert.note: Alert for Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Lee; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 8:15PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Manatee, western Charlotte, northwestern Lee and Sarasota Counties through 900 PM EDT... At 814 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Ellenton to 13 miles southwest of Myakka River State Park to St. James City. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Cape Coral, North Port, Sarasota, Bradenton, Palmetto, Port Charlotte, Anna Maria, South Gate Ridge, Lake Sarasota, Saint Armands Key, Harlem Heights, North Sarasota, Memphis, Cypress Lake, West Samoset, Southgate, Gulf Gate Estates, The Meadows, McGregor and Matlacha Isles-Matlacha Shores. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Charlotte; Coastal Lee; Coastal Manatee; Coastal Sarasota; Inland Lee; Inland Manatee; Inland Sarasota
